query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS incident_responses (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  farmId INT NOT NULL,
  playbookId INT NOT NULL,
  incidentType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') NOT NULL,
  triggerReason TEXT,
  status ENUM('triggered', 'in_progress', 'escalated', 'resolved', 'closed') DEFAULT 'triggered',
  currentEscalationLevel INT DEFAULT 1,
  assignedTo VARCHAR(255),
  notificationsSent JSON,
  responseActions JSON,
  resolvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (farmId) REFERENCES farms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (playbookId) REFERENCES incident_playbooks(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_farmId_status (farmId, status),
  INDEX idx_severity (severity)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kNF22PapS9mysw.root --database WZQk4bD8DnsRHwYBkmh7FN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS incident_responses (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  farmId INT NOT NULL,
  playbookId INT NOT NULL,
  incidentType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') NOT NULL,
  triggerReason TEXT,
  status ENUM('triggered', 'in_progress', 'escalated', 'resolved', 'closed') DEFAULT 'triggered',
  currentEscalationLevel INT DEFAULT 1,
  assignedTo VARCHAR(255),
  notificationsSent JSON,
  responseActions JSON,
  resolvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (farmId) REFERENCES farms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (playbookId) REFERENCES incident_playbooks(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_farmId_status (farmId, status),
  INDEX idx_severity (severity)
);
